subject: Re: [junit] idiom for overriding tearDown()
msgSnippet: ... I would invert those, doing my own tear down first, just to make it the inverse of setUp(), but that s largely an arbitrary choice. -- J. B. Rainsberger,
messageBody:
Shaun Smith wrote:
> c)
>
> protected void tearDown() throws Exception
> {
> super.tearDown();
>
> // tear down your fixture here
> }
>
> ??

I would invert those, doing my own tear down first, just to make it the
inverse of setUp(), but that's largely an arbitrary choice.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
